Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 6.5.1

==Policy Statement==

Mitigate injection vulnerabilities.

==Policy Purpose==

Common vulnerability types should be mitigated to prevent successful attacks that exploit these vulnerability types.
